snippet.title: C-64 Big Top prototype (JWDA)
snippet.description:
This is a prototype of a children's educational game that was done by James WickStead Design Associates that I archived from JWDA graphics designer Robin Ballweg.  According to to her, the game was never developed further beyond this prototype.

From sound designer Todd Marshall: "The 'attract' music is my original composition (and has a Charlie Parker lick in it).  The other music is from the second side of the "Merry Andrew" soundrack, which was a very hard soundtrack album to find, but the best circus music I knew.  I think my rendition of the circus music in "Trapeze" and "Acrobat" sections is fairly good."

See my interview with Todd Marshall at the Atari Compendium website:

http://www.ataricompendium.com/archives/interviews/todd_marshall/interview_todd_marshall.html
